short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Subtracts 5 points from the IMDb score of movies with actors related to a certain cult.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The goal is to help you avoid films that might appear appealing at first glance, but which actually support a shady agenda.

With a bit of luck, this even might help you keep your stress-levels down - if you know what I mean.
